PMD901 BENDING

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x4
Size:
0x2
Source:
spi_regs.rdl

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15:1] RESRVED r 0x0 -
[0] BENDING rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

BENDING

1 - changes PMD901's work mode to bending mode; 0 - PMD901's work mode is normal work mode. This field's value will only take effect when PARK.ENABLE is set
